sys_ui_page.description:
The K16 Incident Manager UI Page.
Contents: - Set a phase 2 (non-cached) jelly variable to the last date/time value on the UI Scripts table. - Include AngularJS from the UI Scripts table, along side all of the required Angular components, and cache the script with our aforementioned jelly variable - Initialize the AngularJS application (using the ng-app attribute). - Initialize the AngularJS controller (using the ng-controller attribute). - Include the templates required for the application (using the ng-include attribute). Each template is a UI Macro.
sys_ui_page.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
</j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: incident_manager
